DataElement.preferredDefinition: Terminology to describe the source of environmental and social factors that might influence a subject's disease or medical condition.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Environmental and Social Factors Domain Exposure Source
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to environmental and social factors that might influence a subject's disease or medical condition._The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience._Where something is available or from where it originates.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

PermissibleValues.value: NON-HOUSEHOLD CONTACT WITH SARS COV-2 POSITIVE INDIVIDUAL
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Non-Household Contact with SARS-CoV-2 Positive Individual

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Non-Household Contact with SARS-CoV-2 Positive Individual
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Exposure to an individual that does not live in the same residence but has tested positive for severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

Concepts.longName: Non-Household Contact with SARS-CoV-2 Positive Individual
Concepts.definition: Exposure to an individual that does not live in the same residence but has tested positive for severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

PermissibleValues.value: HOUSEHOLD CONTACT WITH SARS COV-2 POSITIVE INDIVIDUAL
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Household Contact with SARS-CoV-2 Positive Individual

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Household Contact with SARS-CoV-2 Positive Individual
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Exposure to an individual that lives in the same residence and that has tested positive for severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

Concepts.longName: Household Contact with SARS-CoV-2 Positive Individual
Concepts.definition: Exposure to an individual that lives in the same residence and that has tested positive for severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Exposure in a local area, outside of a hospital setting, where individuals with severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) infection (COVID-19) have been reported.

Concepts.definition: Exposure in a local area, outside of a hospital setting, where individuals with severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) infection (COVID-19) have been reported.
